vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at 2Sa.6.6;
son of: Serug (H8286);
father of: Terah (H8646); also called Chidon (NIV: Kidon) at 1Ch.13.9;
Another name of na.khon (נָכוֹן "Nacon" H5225)
§ Chidon = "javelin"
the owner or site of Uzziah's death for touching the ark
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基頓 这个陽性專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "標槍"
烏撒因扶持約櫃而被擊殺的地點 #代上 13:9|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基顿 这个阳性专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "标枪"
乌撒因扶持约柜而被击杀的地点 #代上 13:9|
